meanings.definition: Able to be divided into parts or analyzed
meanings.sent1: The puzzle was easily parsable into smaller pieces.
meanings.sent2: The instructions were clear and parsable for everyone to follow.
meanings.sent3: The recipe was so parsable that even a robot could cook it!
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a parsable map, each idea neatly separated.
meanings.sent5: The concept of gravity became more parsable after the science class.

meanings.definition: Capable of being understood or interpreted
meanings.sent1: The story was so simple and parsable that even a child could grasp it.
meanings.sent2: The data presented in the report was easily parsable by the team.
meanings.sent3: The joke was so parsable that it made everyone laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: His emotions were like a parsable code, easy to decipher.
meanings.sent5: The painting's meaning became more parsable after the artist explained it.
